codashop.title: About Codashop
codashop.author: Coda Admin
codashop.caption: Codashop is one of the largest and most trusted top-up websites for games and online entertainment in Asia and beyond.
codashop.contents:
What is Codashop?

Codashop is one of the largest and most trusted top-up websites for games and online entertainment in Asia and beyond. Trusted by millions of gamers and digital consumers in over 65 markets worldwide.

Whether it's VALORANT or GTA, Tinder or Spotify, Codashop is the platform of choice for taking life's digital experiences over the top!

Is Codashop Legit?

Yes! Of course, we're assuming that you've asked for permission to spend your money on your in-game credits. Inform your parents or spouse! ðŸ˜‰

Why top up games on Codashop?

Millions of gamers count on Codashop every month for a seamless purchase experience when buying game credits or vouchers.
No registration or log-in is required, and purchases are added to your game account instantly. Top-up your favorite game now! ðŸ˜‰

codashop.title: Terms and Condition
codashop.author: Coda Admin
codashop.caption: Hello Coda friends, Please note that Codashop ...
codashop.contents:
Hello Coda friends,

Please note that Codashop:

  • Unable to cancel or refund transactions that have been carried out
  • Not authorized to move game items from one account to another or withdraw game items from an account for a refund.
Users are solely responsible for ensuring that the data entered when making a transaction is correct.

All game items that have been purchased or shipped are final, and we do not accept refund requests for incorrect purchase transactions (e.g. wrong game ID, etc.).

Please check our Terms and Conditions for more information.

codashop.title: Codashop's Referral Program
codashop.author: Coda Admin
codashop.caption: The Codashop Referral Program requires users to send a unique invitation link to a friend to sign up for a Codashop Account. Once successful, both parties will receive a promo code voucher via email after the referral (friend) makes their first purchase at Codashop. You and your friend can use this promo code for any purchase at Codashop Indonesia.
codashop.contents:
How does the Codashop Referral Program work?

The Codashop Referral Program requires users to send a unique invitation link to a friend to sign up for a Codashop Account. Once successful, both parties will receive a promo code voucher via email after the referral (friend) makes their first purchase at Codashop. You and your friend can use this promo code for any purchase at Codashop Indonesia.

Important: Referrals must be new Codashop account holders and cannot make a purchase with an existing user ID, email or player ID. This referral program is only valid for users in Indonesia.

Is there a reward if I refer a friend?

Of course! You can get a promo code worth IDR 2,500 (up to a maximum of IDR 25,000) if you successfully refer a friend and they make their first purchase at Codashop!
You must complete 10 successful referrals to claim the maximum reward.

Important: Referrals must be new Codashop account holders and cannot make a purchase with an existing user ID, email or player ID. This referral program is only valid for users in Indonesia.

Will my friend receive a gift too?

Yes! Your friend will get a promo code worth Rp 2,500 that can be used the first time they make a purchase at Codashop. In addition, your friend can also increase their claimable reward to IDR 25,000 when completing 10 successful referrals.

How and when will the rewards be received?

As the person providing the referral, you will receive an email and web notification with the promo code when you visit Codashop.

Does the gift voucher have a time limit to be used?

No, they don't. Referral links have no expiration time.

Is there a limit to the number of friends that can be referred or the rewards that can be earned?

For Codashop Indonesia users, the reward that can be claimed is up to IDR 25,000 for you and your referral (friend). Complete 10 referrals to be able to claim the maximum reward amount.

Who can become a referral?

Anyone with a valid Codashop account can join this referral program.

Is there a minimum purchase requirement when using referral reward vouchers?

The purchase amount with the promo code can be less than, equal to, or greater than the promo amount. If the promo value is greater than the purchase amount then the user will "lose" the difference and the promo code will be "forfeited".

codapay.title: About Codapay
codapay.author: Coda Admin
codapay.caption: Codapay is an API service that allows game publishers and other digital content providers to accept over 300 payment methods on their own website.
codapay.contents:
Add Payments to Your Apps

Codapay is an API service that allows game publishers and other digital content providers to accept over 300 payment methods on their own website.

Why Choose Codapay?

Publishers who choose any of Coda's services unlock a range of benefits, including more favorable rates than traditional app stores, support with tax obligations as merchant of record, and access to a reliable and battle-tested platform. Here are a few other things that make Codapay distinctive.

Perks and Benefit with Codapay
  • Increase your revenue, better serve customers

    Credit cards aren't popular in many countries. Enable your customers to pay using the popular local payment methods they want.

  • Improve your margins, save money

    Save money by offering customers low-cost payment options such as e-wallets, bank transfer and cash-at-retail.

  • Simplify your payments project

    A single developer can implement the Codapay API in a few days, and we provide clear documentation and technical support.

  • Unlock global payment coverage

    One integration unlocks a connection to telcos, banks, e-wallets, cash-at-retail, and more in 50+ countries, making it an efficient use of time.

  • Leverage our best-in-class interfaces

    Our hosted payment pages are well-designed, available in local languages, and optimized for conversions on all devices.

  • Be first to access the latest methods

    We constantly add new payment methods, so your customers will have access to the latest options as the landscape evolves.

codapay.title: How to Find a Successful Transaction Voucher Code?
codapay.author: Coda Admin
codapay.caption: Following a successful purchase of a voucher on Codashop, you can find your voucher code at the email address you entered when making a transaction.
codapay.contents:
Following a successful purchase of a voucher on Codashop, you can find your voucher code at the email address you entered when making a transaction.

The voucher code subject line will say, "Thank you for your order!" and it will be sent from "no-reply@codapayments.com" Please see an example below:

Please Note: Check your spam/junk email folder if you don't find it in your regular inbox.

If you still haven't received your voucher code after checking all email folders, please submit the following form to us and our customer support team will assist you in recovering your code:

  • Email address
  • Order date & time
  • Voucher product ordered
  • Transaction amount
  • Receipt screenshot

xshop.title: About XShop
xshop.author: Coda Admin
xshop.caption: xShop enables Coda to extend a Codashop integration to other popular e-commerce platforms and super apps with no incremental technical effort by the publisher.
xshop.contents:
Sell On Our Partner Network

xShop enables Coda to extend a Codashop integration to other popular e-commerce platforms and super apps with no incremental technical effort by the publisher.

Why Choose XShop?

Publishers who choose any of Coda's services unlock a range of benefits, including more favorable rates than traditional app stores, support with tax obligations as merchant of record, and access to a reliable and battle-tested platform. Here are a few other things that make xShop distinctive:

  • Zero technical effort

    If you've already integrated your title to Codashop, you're done; our team does all the heavy lifting to extend that integration to other apps and websites via xShop.

  • Zero additional contracting

    Your agreement with Coda enables us to extend your Codashop integration, with your permission, to our xShop partners - so there's no additional legal work for you.

  • Improve your margins

    Customer purchases through xShop saves you up to 25% compared to traditional app stores.

  • Trusted by the best

    Tinder, Krafton, Garena, and many other additional leading digital content providers use xShop to extend their presence to other popular platforms worldwide.

custom_commerce.title: About Custom Commerce
custom_commerce.author: Coda Admin
custom_commerce.caption: Coda has a decade of success building, operating and scaling an industry leading web store with Codashop. Our seasoned experts are here to design, drive and deliver your Direct-to-Consumer strategy with our Custom Commerce solutions.
custom_commerce.contents:
Coda has a decade of success building, operating and scaling an industry leading web store with Codashop. Our seasoned experts are here to design, drive and deliver your Direct-to-Consumer strategy with our Custom Commerce solutions.

Trust Coda With Your D2C Strategy

  • Customize a complete web store design and gain operational flexibility not found in cookie cutter web store solutions.

  • Avoid being gated by platform functionality that inhibits publishers from scaling a digital merchandising function over time.

  • Retain ownership of the check-out process and all associated data to better understand and engage users and increase lifetime value.

Key Differences
  • Proven D2C Success

    Codashop is the most reliable and tested platform in this category globally. Custom Commerce by Coda is based on a foundation of over a decade of experience.

  • Global Coverage

    Coda is live in the 60+ strategically chosen markets where publishers will generate meaningful revenue. We also support the 300+ payment channels that matter, with additional channel support on demand.

  • Industry Leading API Integrations

    Coda helped pioneer the types of API connections webshops operate on. Weâ€™ve facilitated over 400 API integrations in the last 8 years - greatly surpassing the competition.

  • Transparent and Adaptive Insights

    Coda has unrivaled merchandising expertise in selling digital content for games on the web. Weâ€™ve spent years building a massive paying user base of 80M+ active buyers and maximizing revenue for the largest publishers in the world. Custom Commerce turns our insights into your insights.

  • Localized Marketing Expertise

    Put our marketing support and consultation to work to make your web store a success in untapped markets.

  • Optimized Workflows

    Our workflows are oriented around serving enterprise publishers across live ops, dynamic/personalized SKUs, merchandising, and more.
